sqlMap.update:
/* codeUsemapDAO.updateCodeUsemap */ /* 코드사용맵 수정 */ UPDATE TC_CODE_USEMAP SET
USE_AT = #USE_AT# /* 코드사용맵.사용_여부 */
, UPDUSR_NO = #UPDUSR_NO#::int /* 코드사용맵.수정자_번호 */
, UPDT_DT = NOW() /* 코드사용맵.수정_일시 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND TABLE_NM = #TABLE_NM# /* 코드사용맵.테이블_명 */ AND COLMN_NM = #COLMN_NM# /* 코드사용맵.칼럼_명 */ AND CL_CODE = #CL_CODE# /* 코드사용맵.분류_코드 */
sqlMap.delete:
/* codeUsemapDAO.deleteCodeUsemap */ /* 코드사용맵 삭제 */ DELETE FROM TC_CODE_USEMAP WHERE 1 = 1 AND CL_CODE = #CL_CODE# /* 코드사용맵.분류_코드 */
AND TABLE_NM = #TABLE_NM# /* 코드사용맵.테이블_명 */ AND COLMN_NM = #COLMN_NM# /* 코드사용맵.칼럼_명 */
sqlMap.select: /* codeUsemapDAO.selectCodeUsemap */ /* 코드사용맵 조회 */ SELECT tccodeusemap.TABLE_NM /* 코드사용맵.테이블_명 */ , tccodeusemap.COLMN_NM /* 코드사용맵.칼럼_명 */ , tccodeusemap.CL_CODE /* 코드사용맵.분류_코드 */ , (SELECT obj_description(c.oid) FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c inner join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on c.relnamespace=n.oid WHERE c.relname = tccodeusemap.table_nm AND c.relkind = 'r' AND nspname='gpms') TABLE_COMMENTS , (SELECT (select col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum)) FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c inner join pg_catalog.pg_attribute a on a.attrelid = c.oid WHERE c.relname = tccodeusemap.table_nm AND tccodeusemap.colmn_nm = a.attname AND a.attnum > 0) COLUMN_COMMENTS , tccodeusemap.USE_AT /* 코드사용맵.사용_여부 */ , tccodeusemap.CRTR_NO /* 코드사용맵.생성자_번호 */ , tccodeusemap.CREAT_DT /* 코드사용맵.생성_일시 */ , tccodeusemap.UPDUSR_NO /* 코드사용맵.수정자_번호 */ , tccodeusemap.UPDT_DT /* 코드사용맵.수정_일시 */ , (SELECT tnsysuser.USER_ID /* 시스템사용자.사용자_ID */ FROM TN_SYS_USER tnsysuser WHERE 1 = 1 AND tnsysuser.USER_NO = tccodeusemap.UPDUSR_NO /* 시스템사용자.사용자_번호 */ AND tnsysuser.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tnsysuser.CONFM_AT = 'Y' AND tnsysuser.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) UPDUSR_ID FROM TC_CODE_USEMAP tccodeusemap WHERE 1 = 1 AND tccodeusemap.TABLE_NM = #TABLE_NM# /* 코드사용맵.테이블_명 */ AND tccodeusemap.COLMN_NM = #COLMN_NM# /* 코드사용맵.칼럼_명 */ AND tccodeusemap.CL_CODE = #CL_CODE# /* 코드사용맵.분류_코드 */

/* codeUsemapDAO.selectTables */ /* 테이블 조회 */ SELECT DISTINCT c.relname TABLE_NM, COALESCE (obj_description(c.oid)|| ' ' || c.relname, c.relname) TABLE_COMMENTS FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c inner join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on c.relnamespace=n.oid WHERE ( c.relname LIKE 't%' OR obj_description(c.oid) IN ('CELL_10','CELL_SECT') ) AND c.relname NOT IN ('TOAD_PLAN_TABLE') AND c.relkind = 'r' AND nspname='gpms' ORDER BY TABLE_COMMENTS ASC

/* codeUsemapDAO.selectColumnList */ /* 테이블 조회 */ select c.relname table_nm, a.attname colmn_nm, (select col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum)) || ' ' || a.attname column_comments from pg_catalog.pg_class c inner join pg_catalog.pg_attribute a on a.attrelid = c.oid where 1=1 and ( c.relname like 't%' or c.relname in ('cell_10','cell_sect') ) and c.relname not in ('toad_plan_table') and a.attname not in ('use_at','delete_at','creat_dt','crtr_no','updt_dt','updusr_no') and a.attname not like 'sys_%' /*시스템에서 사용하지 않는 컬럼 항목 제외*/ and c.relname = #TABLE_NM# and a.attnum > 0 order by column_comments asc

/* codeUsemapDAO.selectCodeUsemapList */ /* 코드사용맵 조회 */ SELECT tccodeusemap.* , (SELECT tnsysuser.USER_ID /* 시스템사용자.사용자_ID */ FROM TN_SYS_USER tnsysuser WHERE 1 = 1 AND tnsysuser.USER_NO = tccodeusemap.UPDUSR_NO /* 시스템사용자.사용자_번호 */ AND tnsysuser.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tnsysuser.CONFM_AT = 'Y' AND tnsysuser.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) UPDUSR_ID FROM (SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS rn,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $sidx$ $sord$) rn,
tb.* FROM ( SELECT tccodeusemap.TABLE_NM /* 코드사용맵.테이블_명 */ , tccodeusemap.COLMN_NM /* 코드사용맵.칼럼_명 */ , tccodeusemap.CL_CODE /* 코드사용맵.분류_코드 */ , (SELECT obj_description(c.oid) FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c inner join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on c.relnamespace=n.oid WHERE c.relname = tccodeusemap.table_nm AND c.relkind = 'r' AND nspname='gpms') TABLE_COMMENTS , (SELECT (select col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum)) FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c inner join pg_catalog.pg_attribute a on a.attrelid = c.oid WHERE c.relname = tccodeusemap.table_nm AND tccodeusemap.colmn_nm = a.attname AND a.attnum > 0) COLUMN_COMMENTS , tccodeusemap.USE_AT /* 코드사용맵.사용_여부 */ , tccodeusemap.CRTR_NO /* 코드사용맵.생성자_번호 */ , tccodeusemap.CREAT_DT /* 코드사용맵.생성_일시 */ , tccodeusemap.UPDUSR_NO /* 코드사용맵.수정자_번호 */ , tccodeusemap.UPDT_DT /* 코드사용맵.수정_일시 */ FROM TC_CODE_USEMAP tccodeusemap
ORDER BY tccodeusemap.TABLE_NM ASC /* 코드사용맵.테이블_명 */ , tccodeusemap.COLMN_NM ASC /* 코드사용맵.칼럼_명 */ , tccodeusemap.CL_CODE DESC /* 코드사용맵.분류_코드 */ ) tb) tccodeusemap WHERE 1=1
AND rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
